ingredients: 1  avocado, peeled and pitted,   +   1/2 cup milk,   +   1/4 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
nutrition: Total Fat 8g 10%, Saturated Fat 2g 8%, Cholesterol 2mg 1%, Sodium 16mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 18g 7%, Dietary Fiber 3g 12%, Total Sugars 14g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 5mg 26%, Calcium 42mg 3%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 291mg 6%
